name: Merry Sample Project
description:
What are all your favourite characters from the GB Studio Sample Project up to this Christmas you wonder? Well you're about to find out in Merry Sample Project from GB Studio!

If you want to edit this project or take any assets for you own projects you can download it at:

 https://github.com/chrismaltby/gbs-merry-sample-project

Controls

Movement - Arrow Keys / WASD

Interact - Alt / Z / J

Start - Enter / X / K
